content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Storage chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 335 coal

### Iron Mining Operation at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Storage chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 293 iron ore

### Copper Mining and Processing at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Storage chest at (20.5, 21.5) containing 339 copper ore
- Secondary storage chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing 379 copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Output chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving items from furnace to output chest
- Burner inserter at (23.5, 21.5) moving items from input chest to furnace

### Inactive Smelting Area at (-10, 20)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (-11.0, 20.0)
- Stone furnace at (-9.0, 20.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Placement and Configuration Issues
- When placing inserters, ensure the pickup and drop positions align with the source and destination entities
- Verify that inserters have a valid destination entity before placing them
- The inserter at (23.5, 21.5) is showing a warning about blocked output - ensure there is a proper destination entity to accept items

### Furnace Operation Issues
- Multiple furnaces are showing "no ingredients" status - verify the input inserter configuration is correct
- One furnace is showing "fuel source is full" warning - this is not necessarily an error but indicates potential inefficiency in fuel distribution

### General Structure Planning
- When building processing chains, ensure all components (input storage, inserters, processing buildings, output storage) are properly aligned and connected
- Test each component of the production chain individually before connecting them together to identify issues early
